emuInput.TitMainTitle: Five girls in matching outfits followed by five boys in matching outfits marching in parade on Homewood Avenue at Finance Street intersection, for Black Arts Festival, Homewood
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Headline for image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 2, 1972, pg. 32, reads: "Scenes of Homewood Park Annual Black Arts Festival." [no cutline nor article]
